---
name: Game Request
about: Suggest a game to add to the site
title: 'Feature Request: [Game Name Here]'
labels: ''
assignees: celestrium-games

---

**Name of Requested Game**
The full name of the game that can be Googled.

**Where This Game Can Be Found**
Provide the link to the original, blocked version of the game. Optionally, you could upload a file or folder to be added to the site, and we will do our best to include it.
